DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine the effect of nutrition supplementation on blood protein levels in pediatric burn patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Nutritional Supplementation on Pediatric Burn Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. 110 years of age 2. Hospital admission within 24 hours postburn 3. At least 15% TBSA burned to at least 2nd degree and no more than 5% TBSA 4th degree or higher 4. Capable of exclusive oral feeding within 3 days of hospitalization 5. Expected to be hospitalized at least 14 days 1. History diabetes or stressinduced hyperglycemia 2. Artificial ventilation 3. Requires parenteral or enteral feeding 4. IV albumin 5. Drug that affects metabolism 6. Receiving Dialysis 7. Acutely impacted or constipated 8. Consumes nonstudy nutritional supplement 9. Allergy or intolerance to any study product ingredient 10. Participating in nonAbbott approved concomitant trial
